EmailTemplate.description: Final Approval notification for Compassion Fund request
EmailTemplate.name: Compassion Fund - Final Approval
EmailTemplate.subject: Compassion Fund Request {!Compassion_Fund__c.Name} has reached Final Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Compassion Fund request {!Compassion_Fund__c.Name} has been approved by all Board Members. Please click the link above to view history and comments.
Thank you, The WEX Cares Foundation
